Trade/Device Name(s): Capture Reagent G010, Johnson Grass (Sorghum halepense)
Capture Reagent G002, Bermuda Grass (Cynodon dactylon)
Capture Reagent W001, Common Ragweed (Ambrosia artemisiifolia)
Capture Reagent E005, Dog Dander (Canis familiaris)
Capture Reagent T003, Common Silver Birch (Betula verrucosa)
Capture Reagent F001, Egg White (Gallus gallus)
Capture Reagent F002, Cow's Milk (Bos taurus)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NOVEOS Specific IgE (sIgE) Assay with allergen-specific capture reagents for in vitro quantitative measurement of allergen-specific IgE in human serum using chemiluminescent immunoassay on the NOVEOS Immunoassay Analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative measurement of allergen specific IgE in human serum as an aid in the clinical diagnosis of IgE mediated allergic disorders, used with the NOVEOS Immunoassay Analyzer in clinical laboratories
